website_summaries.verdict: A simple pick for beginning rock climbers or gym enthusiasts wishing for a cost-effective bag.
pros: Includes one large zippered pouch on the front of bag
Comes with a brush holder and slim waist belt
cons: The bag can leak if the drawstring is pulled too tight
Belt can be difficult to remove

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chalk bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product!!! Back in the day, when using chalk for lifting, it would be a very messy ordeal. With the Two Ogres chalk bag it is so much cleaner and handy! Very simply reach into the bag, squeeze the chalk ball a few times, do the other hand, and your ready to do your lift!!! Instead of using straps, chalk helps tremendously with heavy lifts such as deadlifts. However I personally like to use chalk when doing all lifts. It helps me “feel” the bar. It not only gives you better grip, but it gives you more control. I liked this bag so much, I bought one for my sons in AZ!!!! I highly recommend this bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pete The Crazy Canuck

customer_reviews.title: Shell is thin, leads to butt covered in chalk dust after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This chalk bag was great for the first 4 months or so. Now my butt looks like someone has been snorting cocaine off it for the last hour. The way the shell of this bag is woven makes it prone to wear that eventually leads to tiny chalk poofs all over your backside while climbing. Every time the bag bumps you, another chalk mark. This bag is cheaper than other bags on amazon and unfortunately I was fooled by the good reviews. I'm not tough on my chalk bags by any means, but it shouldn't be puffing chalk dust out holes in the sides after 6 months. Do not buy, get something with a stronger shell.
customer_reviews.author: JGM

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bag! It's big enough to fit an adult ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bag! It's big enough to fit an adult hand in, but small enough to be combursome. The blank print is basically a blank canvas. I took a black sharpie to it and drew some pretty cool designs on it. It's definitely worth what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: String broke on the first use
customer_reviews.text: String that holds the bag closed broke on the first use. Poor quality. To quote Charles Barkley "terr-ble"
customer_reviews.author: C Babe

customer_reviews.title: Definitely spills.
customer_reviews.text: I got this when I just started bouldering seriously. I thought any chalk bag would do, but was I wrong. Although this chalk bag holds chalk, it definitely spills chalk as well. The opening doesn't close all the way so I often spill it in my gym bag and over my shoes. The bag is nicely constructed and holds together, but it just spills all the time. There's less spillage when I have less loose chalk and a full chalk ball, but otherwise it gets everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan T.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a month three times a week for top roping and bouldering. It's pretty standard. It does an okay job with keeping loose chalk in, but chalk still gets out. If you get a chalk ball, it should be perfect. The strap is also helpful for bouldering. If you're just top roping, then there's a hoop you can hook it onto your harness. The small zippered pocket can't hold much since it's super narrow/tight (good for keys maybe)
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: It'll get you there.
customer_reviews.text: Decent chalk bag if you are looking for just a basic, cheap way to hold your chalk. Belt adjust nice and big for us larger peoples. The front zipper pocket is ever so slightly short to where it won't comfortably hold a CA drivers License or a credit card standing up (haven't tried it laying horizontal yet). Mine had a couple of "loose threads" around the zipper area too. But really I'm not bummed because I won't be heading up anything crazy anytime soon. All in all if this is your first bag, or you just need a bunch of cost-effective chalk bags I would recommend this one. As the name implies its just the "Essential-Z".
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Altair

customer_reviews.title: Great little starter bag
customer_reviews.text: Great little starter bag. It's not very big so it's perfect for small amounts of chalk (climbing a few times a week).
customer_reviews.author: Andy & Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bag for only about a month, but so far I like it. Attaches to the waist with a click in belt design, which initial I thought I'd hate compared to a carabiner, not it is actually much more convenient. Love the color and the material seems pretty durable. Worth the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Facetown

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a climber... I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a climber... I use it to hold a chalk ball when lifting weights at the gym. It is small in that I can only get one hand in at a time with the chalk ball, but it doesn't take up much space in my bag. No issues with chalk leaking out into my bag so it serves its purpose. Seems to be well made, for the price, I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JessMess

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing bolts or tools!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love using this chalk bag as a tool/fastener holder while working on outdoor events and festivals. Can't speak to its functionality as an ACTUAL chalk holder, but as an all around tool pouch it works great! It is rigid enough to be easy to reach in and grab bolts or small hand tools, but flexible and light enough to not bang around or get caught on things while I am working. Minus one star because the belt loops are far too small for an actual tool belt, so I improvised and have attached it with a carabiner.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Bag For Its Intended Use
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what more you could ask for. I recently got really into rock climbing and bouldering which leaves it self-explanatory as to why I'd need this. I find it fairly simple to open and love the little belt it comes with which has come in handy more than once. I use the small zip pocket to keep my climbing pass in and am overall thankful for my purchase. This bag does a fine job of holding the chalk in and for me, a 5'10" 21 year old male, it is the perfect size and I don't know what more I could ask for.
customer_reviews.author: KPacch

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Works well
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner rock climber, and this chalk bag was one of the most affordable ones I could find that still had good reviews. I am happy to say that it has worked well for me (for about 6 months). I have not had a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: John Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: It does the job but could be a bit bigger
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and quality of materials but the opening is a bit tight and the zipper doesn't work well once it gets some chalk on it.
customer_reviews.author: Slayals

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who was visiting with me and wanted to continue her work out, but forgot her chalk. She really liked the bag and took it back home with her where she is continuing to use it.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Necessity is the Mother of Invention: Dog Training
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the two Ogres Essential-Z Chalk Bag and Belt, not for climbing but for dog training. I put the dog treats in the pouch, on my right side. They are easy to access, and are hidden from the dog, who works on my left. It's the cat's meow, or should I say the dog's woof.
customer_reviews.author: Immer

customer_reviews.title: Holds my chalk well
customer_reviews.text: Great bag and love the neon green.... it pops. The bag holds all the chalk I need for a good 3 hour session and more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast, everything I expected! Recommend to anyone. Thank you. Bought four of them!! Kids love them! Big bag too!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wassom

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: this bag is just as described just know that the hole is just big enough for one hand at a time, not an issue for my 9 year old great bag for the money.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Handgasms
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with this product. The plush interior was so nice that I felt sorry that I had to fill it with chalk. My dry, tattered hands always look forward to reaching into the pleasuring chasm of this sack of goodness. I will recommend this chalk bag throughout all the ages.
customer_reviews.author: Always a Learner

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It’s obviously cheaply made, but it gets the job done. Would recommend if on a budget and just want something to hold your chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but needs work.
customer_reviews.text: Bag looks great but it doesn’t fully seal. I use it for chalk at the gym, but I have to put it in a sealed ziplock to keep the chalk out of my bag. There is a small opening even when it’s sealed it’s tightest.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Branch

customer_reviews.title: Nice chalk bag.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect chalk bag for indoor bouldering. Nice quality, works great with unicorn dust chalk by friction labs.
customer_reviews.author: Traci A

customer_reviews.title: good construction, design, a bit on the small side, wish there was a larger version
customer_reviews.text: design wise this is a nice little bag, good construction. a bit of a small opening, so better for smaller hands if you were wearing it while climbing. I only use it in-between bouldering so it's a good size. fits a chalk ball nicely. zipped pocket is big enough for keys to gym locker and gym membership tag. if this came in sizes, worth 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: geoff

customer_reviews.title: The real advantage that i like about the bag is that I can just throw ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product over a year ago now. I have been using it 5+ days a week at the gym. I use it to hold my chalk I do not really climb I am a crossfitter that uses chalk for bar work. The real advantage that i like about the bag is that I can just throw it on the floor in my car and not have to worry about chalk going everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Bradley

customer_reviews.title: The bag alone is great, my problem with it is that when you ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag alone is great, my problem with it is that when you put chalk in it (I personally use a chalk ball, which is less messy) and try and pull the tie shut a fair amount of chalk escapes just by moving about.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Chalk Chalk Chalky
customer_reviews.text: I started top roping recently, I got this because I needed something smaller than the chalk bucket I use and it had a strap for when I top rope.The opening is a little small for my hands but really I just need to stick a couple of fingers in at a time and most of the time, you know just the tips. The seller was cool. Got it when they said it was going to be delivered no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Paradoxious

customer_reviews.title: Great Value you, good chalk bag.
customer_reviews.text: I would definite purchase again. The inside is baby soft, its like putting your hand in a soft wonderful haven. It's big enough to fit your full hand in a move around a bit and the construction is good. It's a cheap chalk bag but it's better than the price they charge if you ask me. Worth it for someone (like me) who's just getting into climbing and don't want to shell out a ton of cash for a bag that does the exact same thing as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Daveeeeeeep

customer_reviews.title: Great value, wish it were just a bit bigger
customer_reviews.text: Really great bag for the price. Has a nice soft lining and a reasonably large side pocket for your keys that keeps them chalk free and safe. My only complaint is that I wish the well were just a little bit bigger so I could fit a whole chalk block at a time when closed. It's just barely too small, and can't close over the block (meaning potentially chalk all over if you don't use it or store it in a ziplock).
customer_reviews.author: C. Tan

customer_reviews.title: A bargain at twice the price!
customer_reviews.text: The only negative about this bag (that it leaks chalk when the drawstring is pulled tight) is easily solved by winding the excess cord around the neck of the bag and tying it off. No leaks! Buy this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Hagbard Celine

customer_reviews.title: Great but weak material
customer_reviews.text: It has a hole in it after a month after purchasing it. Theres chalk spilling everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: interior stitching didn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: Have gone climbing with this bag exactly 5 times. Took it out to go climbing today and discovered the draw string to cinch the opening closed had ripped through the interior cavity so the string itself was just sitting visibly inside the chalk bag. I go bouldering so the bag sits open on the floor the entire time and I close it when I'm done for the day. Was a nice bag, but the stitching quality on the interior of the bag is apparently not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for big hands
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it was a highly rated beginner's chalk bag and it was cheap. Glad i got it though, its very big and fits my hands much better than the chalk bag i was borrowing from my friend. This bag is deep and wide and perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Semprit

customer_reviews.title: Holds my chalk
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bag about a month and have only used it for indoor climbing, so no loose chalk. The bag does what I need even if it's not a super fun color. The important thing is, I have not opened my climbing bag to find everything inside covered in chalk. I'm a woman with average size hands and they fit in the bag easily. The inside feels nice and soft. For the price, you couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Perfectly Flawed

customer_reviews.title: Your dogs will never see that treat coming
customer_reviews.text: me and my wife use these bags for quick treats when training our dogs The always open feature has been phenomenal and the drawstring to close it all up when we're done is great. I really like how there's two different loops so I can put it around my gun belt or my wife can use a carabiner.
customer_reviews.author: Robb Way

customer_reviews.title: DONT TRUST YOUR GYM
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it a 5 star but my gym I train at threw my bag away :////////. I use it to hold my chalk for deadlifts and I guess the gym decided to toss it instead of putting it in their lost an found. I talked to one of the employees and she told me she tossed it. I can't believe it ://///. Help me two ogres pleeeeease
customer_reviews.author: Collins

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wide Mouth is Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice and wide hole to reach into. The inside is nice and fluffy. Large interior holds more than enough chalk, for climbing purposes. The wide mouth would make it a plus for anyone looking for a gear bag as well. The zippered pocket is much more useful than I thought it would be as it adequately holds the belt that comes with it; great for when I'm not bouldering.
customer_reviews.author: PleX

customer_reviews.title: The drawstring does a good job at keeping chalk from spilling (keep in mind ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic chalk bag that is decent quality and reasonably priced. The drawstring does a good job at keeping chalk from spilling (keep in mind I used a chalk ball in mine and not loose chalk so your mileage may vary). If you aren't looking for anything fancy or stylish, this bag does the job.
customer_reviews.author: EATENG

customer_reviews.title: First chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: It’s has a fluffy inside that I enjoy touching but the draw string is in the middle of the bag I wish it was up a little higher. Another down side is that it does allow a lot of chalk to escape and your back side will be cover in chalk.
customer_reviews.author: WUbulldog

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my floor clean one workout at a time! Yay!
customer_reviews.text: We have gone from chalk all over the floor to chalk not all over the floor, and that is splendid. I was a little worried my husband's big hulk hands wouldn't fit in the bag but they totally do, which is wonderful. Also majorly reduces the dust which is even better :)
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good bag. I have huge hands and this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Baughman

customer_reviews.title: They have been great! Nice build quality and all the buckles/draw strings/zippers ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these as gifts for two new climbing buddies. They have been great! Nice build quality and all the buckles/draw strings/zippers work well.
customer_reviews.author: speed6

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't find a better bag at this price
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find a better bag at this price. The bag is simple and easy to use. The zip pocket is perfect for storing a wedding ring while climbing. The included belt is really nice, with cinchers on both sides of the buckle, prevents long strands from hanging down while still being fully adjustable. Customer service from two Orgres has been great too!
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Chalk often comes out
customer_reviews.text: The seal isn’t tight, so your chalk is likely going to accidentally come out in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sagan

customer_reviews.title: It holds up to my work and that's not easy. It's really a great product
customer_reviews.text: Well let me stay by saying I user this for work not as it's intended use. I climb cell phone towers and one of the guys on the crew had one andi found yours on Amazon. It holds up to my work and that's not easy. It's really a great product.
customer_reviews.author: william baker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good chalk bag, the inside is very soft, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: It will do the job. It's not perfect, but it has worked well for me in the gym. I haven't used it for climbing, but it's been good for weight lifting. It does tend to spill out chalk into my gym bag even when the drawstring is taut, but overall I'm pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Proft

customer_reviews.title: Drawstring doesn't pull all the way shut
customer_reviews.text: First chalk bag I ever bought. The drawstring on the bag does not pull all the way shut to keep the chalk in when storing. I have to put the chalk bag in a plastic bag to keep chalk off everything else in my backpack. It would also be better if it came with a small clip to go on the harness as a second option. Otherwise, decent, good size, let's me fit my whole hand inside.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction, strong fabrics and does a good job ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction, strong fabrics and does a good job of keeping upright when set on the ground during gym and bouldering sessions. Only complaint is that the belt feels less comfortable compared to belts on other chalk bags I've seen, but tucking a shirt under the belt solves that. All in all a high quality bag that I'd recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, maybe purchase a new loop
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice bag and plush inside, which feels nice. You can tell they skimped a little bit on the connecting belt and is just a generic clasp, as mine bent too far the very first time I put it on and doesn't clasp securely now. But, it holds my chalk and I don't climb with it on my waist anyway - for those route climbers, try it and if it doesn't work just get a better belt loop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: DecartesianSplit

customer_reviews.title: Eh...Spills chalk, doesn't close.
customer_reviews.text: Soooo, it is a chalk bag it does hold chalk, but it will not close all the way and chalk gets out, that is a huge deal, plenty big for two grown man's hands, and soft on the inside, light and seems pretty durable, however I will be buying a different chalk bag that does not let chalk spill out.
customer_reviews.author: T mor

customer_reviews.title: My husband really like this bag
customer_reviews.text: My husband really like this bag. I lost him in accident on May 18th, 2017. so he didn't get to use it. But I will tell you it does look like a very nice bag, looks very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Marquette

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Keeps my chalk in and easy to carry around
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Crauswell

customer_reviews.title: Great product! More than pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Keeps the chalk in just fine, a little leaking is expected. Belt is easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Product is solid, the materials aren't the best, but it's not like a chalk bag takes a ton of wear and tear. It's big enough for large hands, and it holds a solid amount of chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Very decent 👍
customer_reviews.text: This is my first chalk bag, and it gets the job done. For the price it's really hard to complain about anything. The pocket on the front is very small though, I can fit my keys in it but that's about it. All in all would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: The Beef

customer_reviews.title: That does mean it doesn't open up wide enough for easy rechalking mid-route
customer_reviews.text: The opening on this bag is designed to close completely, to prevent spills. That does mean it doesn't open up wide enough for easy rechalking mid-route, but I don't think that's a terrible thing.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Silva

customer_reviews.title: Nice chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: Had a little trouble with my bag, sent a reply and a new one was sent out for me. Thank you very much. Nice chalk bag, great customer service. Very happy. Good way to contain the mess at the gym and in my gym bag. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly how it is supposed to. I got the lime green one and it looks exactly like the picture. Also, for what it's worth, the inside is lined with a nice soft lining.
customer_reviews.author: Axel Yates

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Holds chalk like it's made to do. No spillage, but with it all the way closed I wouldn't recommend knocking the bag around if you use loose chalk as opposed to chalk balls.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I only brought this item because the guy that I workout at has a strict policy of no bags in the weight room. This pouch is big enough for my 5.5in cell phone, car keeps, wallet, kindle ( the small book reader) and sometimes a 3ds. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Reaper

customer_reviews.title: Good pouch.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I use it as a slingshot ammo pouch, so it has nothing to do with chalk. Holds my 3/8" steels shots just fine. Love the faux fur lining!
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: It's a fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: it's a really nice climbing bag for chalk, made out of high materials. I use it every time I go climbing, it's a really nice feet, the inside is made out of a really ‏pleasant wool fibers, and the most important thing it's big enough for my huge hands! highly recommend it to all who is in climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Noam

customer_reviews.title: Good Functionality, not the highest quality bag.
customer_reviews.text: Not the highest quality chalk bag, but for the price its fantastic. It does its job great and it was significantly cheaper than the other chalk bags. I'm pleased with it. I have a Samsung Galaxy and when I saw the "Cell Phone Holding Zipper Pouch" I was a bit amuzed cause there is no way my phone would fit in there. I did not buy it for that tho. It is a bag that holds chalk for my hands and it works. No complaints at all about the functionality. I have big hands and have no trouble grabbing chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Breen

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: Great chalk bag, fits large chalk ball. Bonus space in the front zipper. Sturdy enough to stand up without tipping over. Drawstring closure does not spill chalk easily. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Belvis Freshly

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my first chalkbag, and I really like it. Although, a friend got another chalkbag of similar quality for similar price that included a chalk sock. Maybe a suggestion would be throwing one in with it :) I do like this bag, though!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: ... this chalk bag for a bit now and I love it. The inside lining is very soft and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this chalk bag for a bit now and I love it. The inside lining is very soft and it can hold a good amount of chalk. I can get the top to pretty much close all the way and I love that is has a zipper. The color is what drew me to this bag and I used sharpie to draw some pictures on the bag to make it even more personalized.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S

customer_reviews.title: Misleading, not 2 bags! Just brand name of product lol.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag but misleading name. I bought it thinking there were two bags being offered. Nope just the brand name, "two Ogres". Beware if you think you too are purchasing "2" bags!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Climbing!
customer_reviews.text: Item is perfect for our needs and it is tall and sturdy. Good bright color and has a soft lining holds the chalk well deep with little to no chance of spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, very pleased with our whole experience. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hibiscus girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I would’ve liked a bigger pocket for my phone, but it works well and as described
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great size chalk bag and I like the color options as well. I use it mainly when I go to a local bouldering gym. The draw string is good and keeps it closed securely. I really like the zippered pocket in the side. Couldn't ask for a better bag! Great price and does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Chalk Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as it was the best price on Amazon and a few dollars cheaper than any I saw are brick and mortar stores. Its a chalk bag. Exactly what you'd expect out of one. It holds chalk and can be carried or tossed around. Pros: Exactly as expected. Looks good and performs its function well. Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, my bf loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, my bf loves it. Heavy duty construction, large hand opening, convenient key pouch and vibrant design = what's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Elizabeth Proffit

customer_reviews.title: Sweet bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. Been using it for indoor rock climbing. Comes with its own belt or toy can clip it onto a harness.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to climbing. This chalk bag does what it is supposed to at a good price. It holds chalk. Its fairly large too, so you guys can get your large meat hooks in there. Added bonus: It has a soft furry feel inside.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built with an extra long clip system for whatever you may need to attach to. Good customer service as well
customer_reviews.author: Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price! I got the lime green color so it can pop and I won't easily lose it as suppose to a black one. The bag came with the necessary belt and zip bag where I keep my 1/2" tape.
customer_reviews.author: YGomez

customer_reviews.title: Good basic bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag for beginner gym climbing. Holds a chalk ball well and easy to reach into. Zipper pocket is pretty small.
customer_reviews.author: wjb

customer_reviews.title: Great for other uses - Currently I use these bags as camera lens covers.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to carry two water bottles when going on hikes with my wife. The bag is well constructed and the pocket serves to carry a spare camera battery and/or flash memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: great quality - great price
customer_reviews.text: perfect chalk bag and great quality and price. we got them in different colors for the kids and now they have stopped trying to use our bags!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Sargeant

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great little bag. Fantatic customer service. Initially, there was a shipping issue, but their team quickly resolved the problem. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MDR

customer_reviews.title: Standard quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It does its job of holding chalk. Light weight and standard buckle closure for the strap. Drawstring doesn't close all the way. Chalk has started to leak out of the outer seams and into the pocket. I put my watch in the side pocket yesterday and took it out at the end of climbing and it was covered in dusting of chalk. You get what you pay for, but personally I can't justify spending more than $20 for a bag that holds chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: This is a great medium-small chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great medium-small chalk bag. Very inexpensive. The belt fits well, and the pouch has really come in handy. Great price and great product
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hartzer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: The Two Ogres Essential-Z chalk bag appears to be of good quality, comparable to other name brand bags that I've owned, and at a good price. I have large hands and the size of the bag and opening suit me fine.
customer_reviews.author: IHeartAmazon

customer_reviews.title: so I think it does a great job. I ordered the blue
customer_reviews.text: First chalk bag for me, so I think it does a great job. I ordered the blue, it looks great. I like the belt because I boulder with it and can just clip it on and go, even if I dont have belt loops on my outfit. The best feature is that it can be cinched closed so chalk doesn't go all over your gym bag. The small zip pocket and brush holder are nice additions in case you need it. Fit my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: Its a good chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: Its a good chalk bag, comes off and on easy enough for easy sharing. Easy to get your hands into it for chalking up. Holds its shape well, and seals the chalk in well when not in use. The pouch isn't good for much, I've just got a folded up paper towel in mine in case I need it for something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very inexpensive, but functional chalk bag. Bought it for my 11 yr old who always looses his chalk bag.
customer_reviews.author: PacNwGal

customer_reviews.title: Best bag you can buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I have big hands so sliding in and out is a breeze. It has a zipper pouch and a brush holder, and it's less than $20!!! You can't go wrong. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great for bouldering
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for bouldering, I would say everyone that rock climbs or boulders needs to have a bag. The side pocket fits my car key, bouldering membership card, drivers license, credit card and some cash with ease. The drawstring to close it works great, as I rarely find any chalk finding its way out. The interior is super soft and I had no issues at all attaching this to my belt while climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Perrone

customer_reviews.title: Really nice. My second two Ogres product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. My second two Ogres product. The buckle could use a bit more fine tuning but overall really great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pham

customer_reviews.title: no drawstring
customer_reviews.text: it's smaller than I would like and does not have a draw string for closing it when I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: some guy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! The drawstring snapped in half when I tried to open the bag only my third time using it. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Rose City Gardening Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Package was stolen off my porch. Would order again-love the color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft.
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, the bag itself won't tightly contain contain the chalk. Not a problem, but, it is a llittle small for large hands. That's the only downside. Not saying it will spill willy nilly, but there will be dust. Doesn't bother me. I bought the bag solely to take to the gym, for weightlifting, not rock climbing, and I do not regret the purchase, but I can't very well speak for the durability. Picture is of the dust that spills out with some use.
customer_reviews.author: Jatt1016

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I wanted! I love the size and I'm excited I have my own chalk bag for climbing now.
customer_reviews.author: Britnee

customer_reviews.title: Nice chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice chalk bag. It closes tightly, unlike others I've used, so dropping it doesn't result in a mess. It does not have a zipper pocket as pictured, so they should get a correct photo, but I wouldn't use it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Summers

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for a perfect bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag!! Everything about it is high quality. The waist strap and draw string work very well. The inner lining holds chalk well and is also pleasing to the touch. The bag is more greenish in real life which was actually a plus for me! The whole thing is very durable and well constructed. 10/10 would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler. S

customer_reviews.title: It is of good size and quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag every time I go to my climbing gym. It is of good size and quality, and I enjoy the additional zippered pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Basic and as expected
customer_reviews.text: Super simple chalk bag, light weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: molly

product_meta.title: two Ogres Essential-Z Climbing Chalk Bag with Belt and Zippered Pocket for Climbing, Gymnastics, Weight Lifting
product_meta.description:
Back in 2011, when we designed our first chalk bag with a Zippered Pocket, it was an innovation. We wanted you to keep your mind not on your belongings, but on your climbing route, knowing your ID, ring, key are safe with you at all times. Nowadays seeing more and more brands include pockets in their designs, it seems to be contagious, or as they say imitation is the sincerest form of flattery. 

Compared to our earlier models, the Essential-Z chalk bag from two Ogres comes with an enhanced closing to prevent chalk from spilling. Larger size to accommodate big hands. Stiff rim to ensure the bag stays open. Slim belt buckle, so that it's easier to wear on top of a harness. Made with durable materials to withstand every day contact with rough surfaces. Designed as a rock climbing chalk bag, can also be used as a weight lifting or gymnastics chalk bag.

100% warranty covers all manufacturer defects in materials and workmanship for a period of (1) year from the original date of purchase. Designed in California. 

**Be aware of copycats! two Ogres has been designing chalk bags with signature pockets and linings since 2011. All our designs are original. You may see replicates of our designs under different brand names. When making a buying decision, keep in mind that we invest heavily in designing, ensuring quality and testing of our products. Customer satisfaction is our top priority.
feature_bullets: Our signature zippered pocket on the front, to keep your money, ID, ring, key with you while climbing
Bag height of 7 inches and opening of 5 inches to accommodate big hands
Durable 600D Polyester exterior to withstand contact with rough surfaces
Enhanced drawstring closing to prevent chalk from spilling and our signature inner lining to hold down chalk dust
Adjustable slim waist belt, stiff rim and brush holder
